name: Paint Car Derby [Demo]
description:
I'm very exited to release Paint Car Derby! A game that involves driving around, painting the ground, and battling it out with other drivers. Think if Mario Kart and Splatoon had a cross-over. Making this game for One Game a Month I knew I wouldn't have enough time to put in everything I want to, so I'm releasing this as a full demo that you can play! I plan  on working more on this in the future, with much more content including:

  • More maps!
  • More items!
  • More car types! (Heavy, Middle, Light)
  • Local Multiplayer!
  • Whatever bugs you all find...

*Note: If you minimize the window at any time during a match, the match will immediately end. Sorry. :( 

If you find any bugs, like the game, or just want to tell me what you had for lunch today, leave a comment below. I appreciate it! (Even the lunch thing)

Try playing with more teams and larger team sizes for complete mayhem!
*If you play the small battle room with the full 12 cars... well let's just say there will be a lot of damage.

Happy racing!
